data.title: Texas Time Zone
data.meta_description: Current local time in Texas with information about official Texas time zones and daylight saving time.
data.text:
The Current Time in

Eastern Texas is:

Thursday

8/15/2024

2:54 AM

CDT

Eastern Texas

is in the

Central Time Zone

The Current Time in

Western Texas is:

Thursday

8/15/2024

1:54 AM

MDT

Western Texas

is in the

Mountain Time Zone

Central Time Zone

UTC - GMT Offset

Central Time Zone is GMT/UTC - 6h during Standard Time

Central Time Zone is GMT/UTC - 5h during Daylight Saving Time
